mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(bottom_img_url, create_date, u_pk, top_img_url ) VALUES(#{bottomImgUrl}, now(), #{uPk},#{topImgUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT a.r_pk, a.bottom_img_url, a.top_img_url, a.create_date, a.content, b.u_id FROM review a INNER JOIN user b ON a.u_pk = b.u_pk

SELECT a.r_pk, a.top_img_url, a.bottom_img_url, a.create_date, b.u_id, b.u_pk, ur.ur_pk FROM review a INNER JOIN user b ON a.u_pk = b.u_pk LEFT OUTER JOIN used_review ur ON a.r_pk = ur.r_pk WHERE a.u_pk=#{uPk}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO used_review (contents, rating, file_url, title, r_pk ,ur_create_date) VALUES (#{contents}, #{rating}, #{fileUrl}, #{title}, #{rPk} ,now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user u INNER JOIN review r ON u.u_pk = r.u_pk INNER JOIN used_review ur ON r.r_pk = ur.r_pk
SELECT * FROM user u INNER JOIN review r ON u.u_pk = r.u_pk INNER JOIN used_review ur ON r.r_pk = ur.r_pk where ur.ur_pk = #{urPk}
SELECT * FROM used_review a INNER JOIN review r ON a.r_pk = r.r_pk WHERE a.r_pk=#{rPk}
mapper.update: UPDATE used_review SET contents = #{contents}, rating=#{rating}, file_url=#{fileUrl} , title=#{title} where r_pk=#{rPk}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (message, create_date, ur_pk ,u_pk) VALUES (#{message}, now(), #{urPk},#{uPk})
mapper.select: select cm.message ,cm.create_date ,u.u_id from comment cm inner join used_review ur on cm.ur_pk = ur.ur_pk inner join `user` u on cm.u_pk = u.u_pk where ur.ur_pk = #{urPk}
